skills.skill: Bank Loan and Deposit Accounting Systems

duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing general administrative responsibilities including acting as the main liaison for information requests from auditors, preparing Board Reports, and managing problem loan reporting.
Conducting collateral evaluations for stock/bond secured loans and serving as the subject matter expert for CASH program integration.
Managing quarterly problem loan reporting, tracking covenant waiver/forbearance approvals, and assisting in monthly and quarterly preparation of loan reserve and unfunded commitment reserve.
Inputting data needed for monthly upload, reviewing model accuracy, and processing credit pre-screens and approvals.
Serving as a resource for lenders regarding credit approval process and policy matters, and performing other duties and projects as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree (B.A.) from four-year college or university; or equivalent combination of experience and/or training
